title: Climpr Landing Zone Management Configuration schema
description: All properties related to the landing zone management feature configuration.

defaultLocation.description: The default location for for all deployment functions.

rootManagementGroupId.description: The top level Management Group Id for the Climpr deployment.

decommissionedManagementGroupId.description: The Management Group Id for decommissioned landing zones.

billingAccountDisplayName.description: The display name of the billing account associated to this solution.

gitWorkloadRepository.description: All properties associated to the repository creation and configuration for workload repositories.

template.description: The repository name for the template repository for the workload management solution.

defaultTeam.description: Configuration for default team creation functionality for workload repositories.

enabled.description: When set to true, the default team is created.

permission.description: The github permission the team is assigned on the repository.

syncWithEntraId.description: When set to true, an associated Entra Id group and team <--> group mapping is created.

teamNamePrefix.description: Prefix for calculating the default team name.

teamNameSuffix.description: Suffix for calculating the default team name.

teamNameIncludeLzName.description: Including the lz Name in the default team name. Format: '<teamNamePrefix><lzName><teamNameSuffix>'

descriptionPrefix.description: Prefix for calculating the default team name.

descriptionSuffix.description: Suffix for calculating the default team name.

descriptionIncludeLzName.description: Including the lz Name in the default team/group description. Format: '<descriptionPrefix><lzName><descriptionSuffix>'

groupNamePrefix.description: Prefix for calculating the default team name.

groupNameSuffix.description: Suffix for calculating the default team name.

groupNameIncludeLzName.description: Including the lz Name in the default team/group description. Format: '<descriptionPrefix><lzName><descriptionSuffix>'
